column4: I use the xfce desktop, when i use the fn key to change volume and toggle mute/unmute, the notification that shows it is doing it correctly appears, but the volume itself won't change. Any idea on how to fix it?
i am on xubuntu, let me try
my keyboard control disables the volume and the indicators shows, i am on xubuntu (xfce)
i have put y the preferences of xfce4-mixer the analog card too, but still
